headlines: A bit disappointed you retired, wanted you to go past 619: Anil Kumble to AshwinAnil Kumble shared his retirement message for Ravichandran Ashwin after the veteran spinner called it a time on his international career. Ashwin ended his career as India's 2nd highest wicket-taker in Tests after Kumble.

Hunt for WTC Final begins as South Africa announces Test squad vs PakistanSouth Africa has announced its 16-man squad for the upcoming Test series against Pakistan, set to begin on December 26 in Centurion, with a clear focus on securing a place in next year's World Test Championship (WTC) final.

D Gukesh reveals how he plans to spend Rs 11.45 crore world championship prize Chess prodigy D Gukesh shares insight into the world champion's plan for the Rs 11.45 crore prize money. The 18-year-old's  parents made huge sacrifices in his journey to the top.

Coach Andrew Flintoff calls up son Rocky for England LionsEngland Lions head coach Andrew Flintoff has called-up his son Rocky for the team's tour of Australia. Rocky, who is 16, made his first class debut in 2024.

Smriti Mandhana eyes T20I history in series decider vs West IndiesIND-W vs WI-W: Smriti Mandhana has the chance of making the record for most runs in Women's T20Is in a calendar year. Currently, she has 686 runs from 22 matches at an average of 40.35.

Why 'all format star' R Ashwin should not just be remembered for his Test heroicsAs Ravichandran Ashwin calls it a time on his international career, the veteran spinner shouldn't just be remembered for his wizardry in the longest format of the game. Let us recall some of Ashwin's memorable performances in the blue jersey for India.

From James Anderson to R Ashwin: Legends who retired in 20242024 has been a tough year for cricket fans. Several exceptional cricketers have retired this year leaving a gaping hole in the cricketing world. From James Anderson to Ravichandran Ashwin, here's a list of players that retired in 2024.

Halep, Hewitt's son get wildcard for Australian Open 2025 qualifiers Australian Open 2025: Former World No.1 Simona Halep and Lleyton Hewitt's son Cruz have been included as wildcards for the qualifying round for the hard court major at Melbourne Park.

R Ashwin's retirement shocks Brad Haddin, Brett LeeIND vs AUS: India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin's retirement shocked several former cricketers. Former Australia stars Brad Haddin and Brett Lee wondered why Ashwin decided to leave in the middle of the Australia tour.

Manchester United are better with Rashford: Manager Ruben Amorim amid exit talksManchester United manager Ruben Amorim said that the Premier League club are "better" with Marcus Rashford after the forward suggested he could leave Old Trafford.

Thanks for not running me out: Finch's witty wish on Ashwin's retirementAUS vs IND: Former Australian captain Aaron Finch wished Ravi Ashwin after the latter announced his retirement from international cricket. Ashwin called time in his career after the Gabba Test against Australia.

Amid R Ashwin's retirement, Ravi Shastri recalls Dhoni's 'surprise' call in 2014As Ravichandran Ashwin announced his retirement from international cricket, Ravi Shastri recalled when MS Dhoni called it a time on his Test career.

KL Rahul, Ravindra Jadeja's resolve in Gabba augurs well for India: Sunil Gavaskar AUS vs IND: In an interview with India Today, Sunil Gavaskar said that KL Rahul and Ravindra Jadeja's knocks in the third Test at the Gabba would keep India in good stead ahead before the remaining two Test matches.

South Africa announce Test squad for all-important 2-match series vs PakistanSouth Africa announced a 16-member squad for the 2-match Test series vs Pakistan. Corbin Bosch and Kwena Maphaka earned their maiden Test call-ups as the series will be crucial in the lead-up to the WTC final.

R Ashwin retires: What pushed India's best red-ball spinner to call it quitsRavichandran Ashwin's decision to retire from international cricket has shaken Indian cricket. Despite being India's best red-ball spinner, non-selection controversies and undervaluation of specialist skills likely influenced his decision.

Watch: Retiring R Ashwin's emotional parting speech at Gabba dressing room Australia vs India, 3rd Test: R Ashwin addressed the Indian dressing room, hours after announcing his retirement from international cricket. While thanking Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and Gautam Gambhir, Ashwin said the 'cricket nut' in him will keenly follow the rest of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

Nathan Lyon, Pat Cummins present signed Australian shirt to R AshwinAustralia cricketers Nathan Lyon and Pat Cummins presented Ravichandran Ashwin with a signed shirt. Cummins congratulated Ashwin on his stellar career during their short interaction.

Rohit Sharma's emotional farewell message for R Ashwin: You are a true OGRohit Sharma penned down an emotional message for Ravichandran Ashwin as the veteran spinner announced his retirement from international cricket.

Bangladesh bounce back from ODIs heartbreak to win T20I series WI vs BAN: Bangladesh beat West Indies by 27 runs on Tuesday in St Vincent to claim the series 2-0. Shamim Hossain Patowary won the Player of the Match award for his 35-run knock.

Tendulkar on Ashwin's retirement: One of India's greatest match winnersLegendary Sachin Tendulkar hailed Ravichanadran Ashwin as one of India's greatest match winners. Sachin's comments came after the player's shock retirement decision after the conclusion of the Gabba Test.

Soldier's son from Virender Sehwag's school selected for Vijay Merchant TrophyRahul Soreng, son of the late Pulwama hero Vijay Soreng, has made it to the Haryana Under-16 team for the Vijay Merchant Trophy. A proud moment celebrated by Virender Sehwag, showcasing the power of opportunity and resilience.

Pat Cummins praises 'all-time great' R Ashwin on retirement AUS vs IND: Pat Cummins said that he was surprised after R Ashwin announced his retirement from international cricket. Ashwin took the call after the Gabba Test against Australia in Brisbane.

Sam Altman aims to oust the group that tried to fire him from OpenAI last yearIn a bid to restructure OpenAI from a non-profit to a for-profit organisation, the company's CEO Sam Altman is apparently trying to remove the organisation that tried to remove him from the company last year.

Samsung Galaxy S25+ design leak ahead of launchSamsung Galaxy S25 series is speculated to debut in January 2025. While the company is yet to notify, a recent leak reveals what the Galaxy S25+ may look like.

iOS 18.3 in beta testing: Top features, release date, and other detailsApple's iOS 18.3 beta brings minor updates, including robot vacuum support in the Home app, bug fixes, and small interface tweaks.

Apple needs to make Apple TV that can run AAA games, challenge Xbox and PlaystationApple needs a gaming boost for its devices. Until now, it might have been the case that its devices were not powerful enough for AAA games. Now they are, and Apple might do well to create a new Apple TV that can challenge Xbox and PlayStation in gaming.

OnePlus 13R is coming to India, company confirms launch date and key featuresThe OnePlus 13R is also coming to India. The company has finally confirmed the existence of this device and revealed the launch date as well. The mid-range premium phone will debut on January 7, alongside the flagship OnePlus 13 smartphone and OnePlus Buds Pro 3 earphones.

Xiaomi Sound Outdoor speaker review: Affordable price, great sound, cool designIf you are in the market for a Bluetooth speaker that sounds good and is easy to carry around, while also being affordable, Xiaomi's new Sound Outdoor speakers are definitely worth considering. Priced at Rs 3,499, these outdoor speakers look cool and sound great. More details on it in this review by India Today Tech.

Using UPI for online payments? Do this to avoid QR code scamsScammers are tricking users into scanning fraudulent QR codes, leading to the loss of large sums of money in seconds. Here is how QR code scams work and how you can protect yourself from them.

Scan QR code to get your package: DHL delivery scam goes viralA new scam involving DHL package delivery has surfaced, causing concerns among citizens who are receiving suspicious notifications. Here are the details.

Poco M7 Pro 5G launched under Rs 15,000: 4 reasons to buy, 1 to skipThe Poco M7 Pro 5G is one of the most affordable phones you can buy right now in the sub-Rs 15,000 price segment. In this article, we give you 4 reasons why you should buy this phone and 1 reason to skip it.

Realme 14x launched in India at a starting price of Rs 14,999Realme has launched a new budget smartphone in India, which comes with a massive 6,000mAh battery, 50-megapixel main camera, and a 120Hz display.
Elon Musk says stop using hashtags on X because they look uglyHave you still been using hashtags? You don't need them anymore, at least on X, and the company CEO Elon Musk has confirmed that.

With DMRC's Momentum 2.0 app, you don't need a Delhi metro card anymoreDMRC has introduced an app called Momentum 2.0 Delhi Sarthi, available for both Android and iOS users — designed to make metro travel smoother for everyone.

Realme 14x launching in India today: What to expect Realme 14x is all set to launch in India today. While the company has revealed a few details, several specs are still under wraps. Let's take a look at what we can expect from this entry-level phone.

YouTube says it will soon start detecting AI avatars of celebritiesYouTube is teaming up with the Creative Artists Agency (CAA) to roll out tools that allow creators and celebrities to detect AI-generated content that uses their image, face, or voice.

Ahead of Donald Trump taking charge, tech CEOs from Cook to Zuckerberg lineup at his residence for dinnerDonald Trump is set to be the next US president at a ceremony in January. Ahead of that, however, tech CEOs from Sundar Pichai to Tim Cook are going and meeting Trump at his massive residence called Mar-a-Lago.

Poco M7 Pro 5G quick review: Can it shake up the budget price segment?In the budget smartphone market, the Poco M7 Pro really stands out, especially for its design and build. It has a sleek and modern look that makes it feel much more premium than its price would suggest.

OnePlus 13 India launch date announced, OnePlus 13R is also likely to debut OnePlus has finally announced the India launch dates of its upcoming flagship, OnePlus 13. But, the company is using the word series with it, which means that there are more phones. This will likely be the OnePlus 13R, something which the rumour mill has been suggesting for some time now. Here are the details.

Poco M7 Pro 5G launched in India, price starts at Rs 13,999The Poco M7 Pro 5G has officially launched alongside the Poco C75 5G in India. The phone is powered by the Dimensity 7025 Ultra SoC and has a 5,110mAh battery under the hood.
With Kendall and Hailey backing it, will NAD+ witness a boom in Indian market?A look into the science, the stars, and the soaring interest in NAD+ as India joins the global wellness race.

Can microdosing on Ozempic help you lose weight without any side effects? Microdosing Ozempic has gained momentum online, with people hoping to use the weight-loss benefits while dodging the side effects.

You've been misunderstanding Trauma Bonding all along. It's a toxic trapMany may assume trauma bonding is a positive bond shared over a past trauma, but you will be surprised that it is absolutely not what you think.

The struggles of pet owners no one talks about in IndiaIndian pet parents, especially dog owners, feel that India is yet to become more accommodating for pets. There are several struggles that often go unnoticed despite the ever-growing Indian pet market.
No, Soursop, a fruit, cannot cure cancer Soursop, a close cousin of the famous custard apple, is gaining buzz on social media for its anti-cancerous properties.

How to keep romance alive after marriage, if you live with familyMarriage counselors say that finding privacy and keeping romance alive is a common challenge for Indian couples living with their families. However, it is certainly possible to keep the spark alive.

Another day, another tantrum. How to manage your child's anger and stubbornnessEvery parent knows the struggle when their child throws a fit after being told 'no'. It's frustrating, and while you know this behaviour isn't healthy, how should you handle it?
How Bhutan's Ema Datshi became one of India's most searched recipesGoogle India's year-end report revealed that Ema Datshi was one of India's top 10 most-searched recipes in 2024.

DIY 'collagen supplement' is viral for glowing skin, but experts have a warningIn the quest for youthful, glowing skin, the spotlight has turned to humble kitchen staples - Amla, beetroot, carrot, and apple - with skinfluencers touting a drink made from them as a collagen supplement.

Can viral silicone socks treat cracked heels and dry feet in winter?Unlike regular fabric socks, silicone socks function like a snug silicone glove for your feet. But can they truly be a game-changer in treating cracked heels and dry feet?

Does living together before marriage lower the chance of divorce?Thinking about marriage but unsure if you'll be able to adjust to living together? Why not try a live-in relationship first to see how things go before taking the next step?

No more ear-ritation! Here's how to deal with airplane ear If you feel a strange sensation in your ear as soon as your flight takes off, you might be dealing with airplane ear. While it can be uncomfortable, it can be relieved with some simple tricks.
Is winter depression real? Experts weigh inSeasonal Affective Disorder (SAD) is a form of 'sadness' more prevalent in specific seasons, typically autumn and winter.

Can peeing after sex really prevent UTI? It is believed that urinating after sex is not merely a good hygiene practice but also keeps issues like UTI (urinary tract infection) and other infections away, especially among women.

How long can you wear makeup without risking skin damage?Who doesn't love showing off flawless skin? While makeup can definitely help you achieve that perfect look, how long should you actually keep these products on?
Can you live forever like Bryan Johnson wants to?Can money, science, and obsession really cheat death? US tech millionaire Bryan Johnson thinks so.
Why a turtleneck is the fashion BFF you need this (and every) winterThough a basic winter staple, turtlenecks can be the key to having a super-stylish winter.

Why solo trips are essential, even when you have a partner or kidsTravelling solo might seem odd when you have a partner, but it offers unique benefits that strengthen both your relationship and personal growth.

Pilates vs weight training: Which one helps you lose weight faster?Pilates was developed by Joseph Pilates in the early 20th century during World War I as a method to rehabilitate injured soldiers and dancers.

Mocha Mousse, Pantone Colour of the Year 2025: The India editFor the Indian palette, Mocha Mousse is a perfect match! Whether in your wardrobe, home interiors, or makeup, the Pantone Colour of the Year 2025 effortlessly adds a luxe twist to your style.

Thaman S: The creative force behind hits like Ramuloo Ramulaa and Nain MattakaThaman S, famed for his South Indian hits, is set to debut his first full Bollywood album with Baby John this Christmas. The film stars Varun Dhawan in the lead and the will be released on December 25.

Taapsee Pannu begins shoot for Gandhari: Let the war beginAfter Phir Aayi Haseen Dilruba, Taapsee Pannu began filming her next film. Titled Gandhari, the action-thriller is produced by Kanika Dhillon and directed by Devashish Makhija.

20 years of Swades: Exploring the timeless relevance of Shah Rukh Khan filmReleased in 2004, Ashutosh Gowariker's Swades remains a poignant narrative in Indian cinema. Starring Shah Rukh Khan, it explores themes of identity, responsibility, and self-reliance.

Relive Mohan Bhargava's journey of homecoming as Swades completes 20 yearsAshutosh Gowariker's film Swades turned 20 today. The filmmaker shared a heartfelt letter celebrating the milestone on Instagram.

Sikandar teaser to release on Salman Khan's 59th birthday: ReportThe much-awaited teaser for Sikandar will be reportedly release on Salman Khan's 59th birthday. Fans are eager for this special birthday treat from the Bollywood superstar.

Varun Dhawan on Salman Khan's cameo in Baby John: Its impact will last for many daysSalman Khan is set to make a cameo appearance in the upcoming film Baby John. Varun Dhawan, who plays the lead in the movie, shared insights about the superstar's role.

Varun Dhawan on Baby John being a Theri remake: We had to change a lotActor Varun Dhawan clarified that his upcoming film, Baby John is an adaptation of the Tamil movie Theri, not a remake. He also said that Baby John has significant changes.

KJo on 23 years of Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham: One of those pinch me moments…Karan Johar celebrated 23 years of the iconic movie Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham. On Saturday, the filmmaker shared stills from the film with a heartfelt note on Instagram.

Rani Mukerji's Mardaani 3 to release in theatres in 2026The makers of the upcoming film Mardaani 3 announced that the film will release in theatres in 2026. Actor Rani Mukerji will reprise her role as Shivani Shivaji Rao.

SRK shares sweet birthday wish for 'coolest and bossest' RajinikanthSuperstar Shah Rukh Khan on Thursday shared the sweetest birthday wish for megastar Rajinikanth. Sharing a photo of himself with the icon, SRK called Rajinikanth 'remarkably simple' and 'inspiring.'

Akshay Kumar injures his eye on Housefull 5 set: ReportBollywood star Akshay Kumar reportedly suffered from an eye injury while shooting for the comedy, Housefull 5. The incident took place while the actor was filming a stunt sequence.

Preity Zinta's sweet BTS moment from Dil Chahta Hai: A chocolate croissant to rescuePreity Zinta shared a heartwarming behind-the-scenes story from the shoot of Dil Chahta Hai, highlighting a moment of hunger and humour that ended with a chocolate croissant.

Anees Bazmee recalls being Raj Kapoor's assistant director: He breathed cinemaDirector Anees Bazmee opens up about being iconic filmmaker Raj Kapoor's former assistant director. Bazmee had assisted Kapoor on Prem Rog.

Go this weekend: All We Imagine as Light back in cinemas, Payal Kapadia thrilledDirector Payal Kapadia's film, All We Imagine As Light, has returned to cinemas with improved showtimes in select cities.

Priyanka Chopra on working in SRK's Don: I tasted blood a little bitGlobal icon Priyanka Chopra recently opened up about working in the Farhan Akhtar directorial, Don, which also starred superstar Shah Rukh Khan in the lead.

Don teaser: Diljit Dosanjh collabs with OG don SRK for upcoming music videoDiljit Dosanjh has released a teaser for his music video Don, featuring a special voiceover by Shah Rukh Khan. The teaser has captured fans' attention with SRK's powerful narration.

Varun Dhawan's Baby John: What to expect from the remake of Atlee's TheriBollywood star Varun Dhawan takes on a thrilling new role in Baby John, a remake of the Tamil hit, Theri. Directed by Kalees and produced by Atlee, the film promises action, drama, and emotional depth.

Vikramaditya Motwane criticises Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 for dominating screensDirector Vikramaditya Motwane recently criticised multiplexes for giving most of its shows to Allu Arjun-starrer Pushpa 2. Motwane said that some shows should have been kept for the acclaimed All We Imagine As Light too.

Zeenat Aman reveals how Khaike Paan became a surprise hit after it was rejectedZeenat Aman shared an intriguing story about the iconic Bollywood song Khaike Paan Banaraswala, which became a hit after initially being rejected for another film. The song, featuring Amitabh Bachchan, added a light-hearted moment to the film Don and has left a lasting cultural impact.

SRK predicts Varun Dhawan's Baby John could be as big as JawanShah Rukh Khan, impressed by Baby John's distributor's cut, predicted it could match the success of Jawan, highlighting its potential as a box office hit.

Own foreign assets or income? Disclose now to avoid Rs 10 lakh penaltyTaxpayers must disclose foreign income and assets by December 31, 2024, to avoid hefty penalties under the Income Tax and Black Money Acts.

Sensex, Nifty end lower as US trade and Fed jitters spook investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 502.25 points to end at 80,182.20, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 137.15 points to close the day at 24,198.85.

Va Tech Wabag shares: Why VA Tech Wabag stocks are in focus?As of 2:50 PM, the shares were trading at Rs 1,655.15, down 12.20% from the previous close. Earlier in the day, the stock dropped to Rs 1,586.50 on the NSE, marking a 15.8% decline.

Explained: Why Enviro Infra share price fell 10% in early trade today The decline in Enviro Infra's share price comes on the same day the company is set to announce its financial performance for the quarter ended September 30, 2024.

Facebook owner Meta hit with 251 million euros in fines for 2018 data breachIreland's Data Protection Commission issued the penalties to Meta after wrapping up its inquiry into the breach, when hackers gained access to user accounts by exploiting bugs in the platform's code.

Cryptocurrencies to be taxed as capital gains: Relief for pre-FY23 earningsThe Income Tax Appellate Tribunal (ITAT) decision defines cryptocurrencies as capital assets, distinguishing pre-2022 profits as capital gains and applying a 30% flat tax to post-2022 transactions.

Income Tax Department admits error of sending wrong ITR notices. Check details The Income Tax Department has acknowledged its mistake in sending defective ITR notices, offering relief to many, though taxpayers who filed revised returns could face complications.
